Title: Enquiries (leads) and follow-ups workflow

Description:

Capture external enquiries, track follow-ups, and support conversion from enquiry -> student.

Acceptance criteria:
- Enquiry model with contact info and source.
- Follow-up entries with status (pending/done) and method (sms/call/in-person).
- Endpoint or admin UI to convert enquiry to student and optionally transfer relevant data.
